entry.title: WIND WARNING, Port-Menier

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
